dmca.title: Complaint against USAFTA.com
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Jon Kelly [mailto:jkelly@surehits.com] 
Sent: Monday, February 26, 2007 3:23 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: Complaint against USAFTA.com

 

USAFTA.com is violating the intellectual property of Cyberspace
Communications Corp dba SureHits ("CCC") and the DMCA.  The website
found at http://www.usafta.com <http://www.usafta.com/>  duplicates all
of the text found at http://www.nextinsure.com
<http://www.nextinsure.com/> , a website owned and operated by CCC.
Sub-pages of usafta.com also duplicate sub-pages of Nextinsure.com, such
as http://www.usafta.com/contact_us.asp.  

 

It is our good faith belief that use of the material in this manner by
USAFTA.com is not authorized by our company or any agent of our company
and is in violation of the law.

 

The information in this notification is accurate and under penalty of
perjury I certify that that CCC is the owner of this copyrighted
material and that I, as President, am authorized to act on behalf of
CCC.

 

Please immediately disable access to the infringing material on this
site.

Electronically signed,

Jon Kelly
President, Cyberspace Communications Corp. / SureHits
1726 South Kelly Ave.
Edmond, OK 73013
801-302-9597
